events.title: Veterans Support Group Meeting - Weekly Check-in
events.excerpt: Join us for our weekly support group meeting. We'll be discussing reintegration strategies and sharing experiences.

events.title: Career Workshop for Veterans - Resume Building
events.excerpt: Learn how to translate your military experience into civilian terms that employers understand and value.

events.title: Annual Veterans Appreciation Picnic
events.excerpt: Join us for food, games, and camaraderie at our annual appreciation event for veterans and their families.

events.title: Mental Health First Aid Training for Veterans
events.excerpt: Learn how to identify, understand and respond to signs of mental health challenges and substance use disorders.

events.title: VA Benefits Information Session
events.excerpt: Get the latest information about VA benefits, eligibility requirements, and application processes.
